languages.text: "А также — пиратские гнезда, схроны контрабандистов и оплоты дюжины банд, группировок и фракций. В Просторе Коронус Империум полагается на такой вот форпост. Окраины владений Человечества редко бывают схожи с центральными мирами, однако пока Футфол служит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Богу-Императору{/g} — как умеет — он все еще считается цитаделью Империума. Хотя, говорят, подати с него отсылаются весьма... посредственные".

traits.locale_text: "А также — пиратские гнезда, схроны контрабандистов и оплоты дюжины банд, группировок и фракций. К сожалению, Империум пока что вынужден полагаться на такой вот форпост... хотя порой даже неясно, относится ли Футфол к Империуму или уже нет. Так или иначе, пока местные чтут Императора и блюдут хоть какие границы — их терпят".

languages.text: "Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."
languages.original_text: "А также — пиратские гнезда, схроны контрабандистов и оплоты дюжины банд, группировок и фракций. В Просторе Коронус Империум полагается на такой вот форпост. Окраины владений Человечества редко бывают схожи с центральными мирами, однако пока Футфол служит {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Богу-Императору{/g} — как умеет — он все еще считается цитаделью Империума. Хотя, говорят, подати с него отсылаются весьма... посредственные".

traits.locale_text: "Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."

"Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups and factions. Unfortunately, the Imperium us forced to rely on such an outpost for now... Although sometimes it is not even clear whether Footfall can be considered a part of the Imperium at all. One way or the other, the locals are tolerated as long as they worship the Emperor and stay mindful of at least superficial decency."

"Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."

"Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. Unfortunately, the Imperium is forced to rely on Footfall as an outpost for now... Although sometimes it is not even clear whether Footfall should be considered a part of the Imperium at all. One way or the other, the locals are tolerated as long as they worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} and keep their activities in check, to a degree."

"Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."

"Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."

languages.text: «También cabe mencionar que es un lugar lleno de escondites piratas, alijos de contrabandistas y las fortalezas de al menos una docena de bandas, grupos y facciones. Es el puesto de avanzada del Imperium en la Extensión. Los límites de los dominios de la Humanidad rara vez se parecen a sus mundos centrales, pero mientras Paso sirva al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g} (por lo menos en la medida de lo posible) se considerará una ciudadela del Imperium. Aunque debo admitir que se dice que el diezmo que envía es... decepcionante, por así decirlo».
languages.original_text: "Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."

traits.locale_text: «También cabe mencionar que es un lugar lleno de escondites piratas, alijos de contrabandistas y las fortalezas de al menos una docena de bandas, grupos y facciones. Es el puesto de avanzada del Imperium en la Extensión. Los límites de los dominios de la Humanidad rara vez se parecen a sus mundos centrales, pero mientras Paso sirva al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g} (por lo menos en la medida de lo posible) se considerará una ciudadela del Imperium. Aunque debo admitir que se dice que el diezmo que envía es... decepcionante, por así decirlo».

languages.text: “更不用提，这里还有很多海盗藏身处、走私者藏匿处，以及许多属于当地帮派、组织与派系的堡垒。这个地方是帝国在科罗努斯扩区的前哨站。这里是人类帝国的边缘地带，与帝国的中心世界有着巨大的区别，但只要落脚港依然为{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}服务，它就依然会被视为帝国的要塞。不过，我听说这个地方缴纳的什一税……就算往好听了说，也只能用‘寥寥无几’这个词来形容。”
languages.original_text: "Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."

traits.locale_text: “更不用提，这里还有很多海盗藏身处、走私者藏匿处，以及许多属于当地帮派、组织与派系的堡垒。这个地方是帝国在科罗努斯星域的前哨站。这里是人类帝国的边缘地带，与帝国的中心世界有着巨大的区别，但只要落脚港依然为{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}服务，它就依然会被视为帝国的要塞。不过，我听说这个地方缴纳的什一税……就算往好听了说，也只能用‘寥寥无几’这个词来形容。”

languages.text: 「わざわざ言う必要もありませんが、海賊の棲家、密輸業者の隠れ家、そして何十ものギャングや集団、派閥が持つ砦。コロヌス・エクスパンスで、帝国はこれを開拓地として活用しています。人類の日陰者の領地が主要惑星に似ることはそうそうありませんが、フットフォールが{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}に仕えている限りーー仕えられる間はーー帝国の城と見ていいでしょう。ですが、送られてくる税は...控えめに言っても圧倒的な少なさだと聞いています」
languages.original_text: "Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."

traits.locale_text: 「わざわざ言う必要もありませんが、海賊の棲家、密輸業者の隠れ家、そして何十ものギャングや集団、派閥が持つ砦。コロヌス・エクスパンスで、帝国はこれを開拓地として活用しています。人類の日陰者の領地が主要惑星に似ることはそうそうありませんが、フットフォールが{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}に仕えている限りーー仕えられる間はーー帝国の城と見ていいでしょう。ですが、送られてくる税は...控えめに言っても圧倒的な少なさだと聞いています」

languages.text: "Von Piratenverstecken, Schmuggellagern und Hauptquartieren von einem Dutzend Banden, Gruppen und Gruppierungen ganz zu schweigen. Das Imperium benutzt es als sein Außenposten in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Die Randgebiete des Territoriums der Menschen ähneln nur selten den zentralen Welten, aber solange Footfall im Rahmen seiner Möglichkeiten dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperator{/g} dient, gilt es weiterhin als Zitadelle des Imperiums. Ich habe allerdings gehört, dass der Zehnt, den es schickt ... unterwältigend sein soll, vorsichtig ausgedrückt."
languages.original_text: "Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."

traits.locale_text: "Von Piratenverstecken, Schmuggellagern und Hauptquartieren von einem Dutzend Banden, Gruppen und Gruppierungen ganz zu schweigen. Das Imperium benutzt es als sein Außenposten in der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Die Randgebiete des Territoriums der Menschen ähneln nur selten den zentralen Welten, aber solange Footfall im Rahmen seiner Möglichkeiten dem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperator{/g} dient, gilt es weiterhin als Zitadelle des Imperiums. Ich habe allerdings gehört, dass der Zehnt, den es schickt ... unterwältigend sein soll, vorsichtig ausgedrückt."

languages.text: « Sans parler des repaires de pirates, des cachettes de contrebandiers et des forts appartenant à une dizaine de gangs, de groupes et de factions. Les frontières du domaine de l'humanité ressemblent rarement aux mondes centraux, et l'Imperium a besoin de cet avant-poste dans les Étendues de Koronus. Tant que Castel restera au service de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g}, dans la mesure du possible, il sera considéré comme une citadelle impériale. Cela dit, il paraît que sa contribution en matière de taxes est pour le moins... décevante. »
languages.original_text: "Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."

traits.locale_text: « Sans parler des repaires de pirates, des cachettes de contrebandiers et des forts appartenant à une dizaine de gangs, de groupes et de factions. Les frontières du domaine de l'humanité ressemblent rarement aux mondes centraux, et l'Imperium a besoin de cet avant-poste dans les Étendues de Koronus. Tant que Castel restera au service de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g}, dans la mesure du possible, il sera considéré comme une citadelle impériale. Cela dit, il paraît que sa contribution en matière de taxes est pour le moins... décevante. »

languages.text: "Korsan sığınaklarını, kaçakçı zulalarını ve onlarca çete, grup ve fraksiyonun kalesini söylemeye bile gerek yok tabii. İmparatorluk orayı Koronus Enginliği'ndeki karakolu olarak görür. İnsanlığın diyarının en uç kısımları, merkezî dünyalara pek benzemez. Binliman ise {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator'a{/g} hizmet edebildiği yere kadar hizmet ettiği sürece bir İmparatorluk hisarı olarak değerlendirilmeyi sürdürecektir. Yalnız oradan gönderilen aşarların en hafif tabirle... İç açıcı olmadığını söyleyebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Not to mention pirate hideouts, smuggler caches, and forts belonging to a dozen gangs, groups, and factions. In the Koronus Expanse, the Imperium relies on this as its outpost. The fringes of Humanity's domain rarely resemble its central worlds, but so long as Footfall serves the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g} — insofar as it can — it will be considered a citadel of the Imperium. Although, I have heard that the tithes it sends are... underwhelming, to say the least."

traits.locale_text: "Korsan sığınaklarını, kaçakçı depolarını ve onlarca çete, grup ve fraksiyon kalesini söylemeye bile gerek yok tabii. Koronus Enginliği'nde İmparatorluk onu bir karakolu olarak görüyor. İnsanlığın diyarının en kenar kısımları merkezî dünyalara pek benzemez ama Binliman, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g}'a hizmet edebildiği yere kadar hizmet ettiği sürece bir İmparatorluk hisarı olarak değerlendirilmeyi sürdürecek ancak gönderdiği vergilerin en hafif tabirle iç açıcı olmadığını söyleyebilirim."
